channel.title: Economics on Welcome
channel.description: Recent content in Economics on Welcome

item.title: Abstract economics model of knowledge generation
item.description: This is a pure theoretical work in innovation economics and economics of technology. It describes forces that lead to the appearance of so called general purpose technology (GPT) in the economy (think of electricity or information and communication technology (ICT) as examples). These technologies find applications in various sectors of economy transforming the way people work and adding economic value. My work demonstrates that under certain conditions four forces might lead to a formation of such a general knowledge.
